author: Rei Takver
description:
Councillors in West Northamptonshire last night slammed Reform UK’s plan to access council data as part of a drive that it claims is intended to reduce local “fraud and waste”. In a key test of Reform’s battle to access data from councils, West Northamptonshire became the first to welcome unnamed and unpaid “experts” from the party’s […]

The post ‘No Such Thing as a Free Lunch’: Opposition Outcry over Reform’s Secretive DOGE Unit appeared first on DeSmog.
title: ‘No Such Thing as a Free Lunch’: Opposition Outcry over Reform’s Secretive DOGE Unit
